Module count
Package count.model

Class MLDistribution

java.lang.Object
count.model.ML
count.model.MLDistribution
public class MLDistribution
extends ML
Maximum likelihood for one-class model using distribution parameters (loss probability, duplication probability and gain rate).
Author:
csuros

      public void setCalculationWidth​(int absolute, double relative)
